fr.loria.synalp.emotionml
Class Emotion

java.lang.Object
  fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.info.InfoCarrier
      fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.vocabularies.VocabularyReferrer
          fr.loria.synalp.emotionml.Emotion
All Implemented Interfaces:
EmotionNode
public class Emotion
extends VocabularyReferrer
implements EmotionNode

An Emotion is the representation of an affective state in EmotionML. An Emotion is primarily described as a list of EmotionDescriptors (Category, Dimension, Appraisal, ActionTendency). These EmotionDescriptors correspond to aspects of the Emotion. An Emotion is considered valid with regards to the descriptors if it defines vocabularies for each of the descriptors that it contains (see VocabularyReferrer). There are two ways to define vocabularies:

  • you can directly call methods of VocabularyReferrer, for instance setCategorySetURI
  • you can also set the URI of the descriptor before adding it to the Emotion. This mechanism is mainly used to facilitate the vocabulary URI management. For instance, all descriptors defined in the predefined vocabularies have already a correct vocabulary URI. This URI is copied onto the Emotion vocabulary URI when adding the descriptor to the Emotion.
Additionnally, an Emotion may contain timing information, a text value, references to what caused the emotion and modality information.

Author:
Alexandre Denis
See Also:
EmotionDescriptor, VocabularyReferrer

Method Detail

add

public void add(EmotionDescriptor descriptor)
Adds the given EmotionDescriptor to this Emotion. If there already exists an EmotionDescriptor with the same name and type, it is replaced by the given one. If the given EmotionDescriptor has an URI, this method also sets the vocabulary URI of the whole Emotion corresponding to the vocabulary type. For instance if calling this method with a Category whose vocabulary URI is defined, this method sets the category-set URI of the whole Emotion, replacing it if there is already one. Warning though, setting manually the URI of the EmotionDescriptor afterwards will not set the Emotion vocabulary set URI.

Parameters:
descriptor -

addAll

public void addAll(Collection<EmotionDescriptor> descriptors)
Adds all the given EmotionDescriptors to this Emotion. See add.

Parameters:
descriptors - a collection of descriptors
